question: Which are the two basin countries of the "Sarstoon River"?
explanation: The Sarstoon River is a Central American river that forms part of the international border between Belize and Guatemala. The Sarstoon is the internationally accepted southern border between Belize and Guatemala, although as part of the Belizeanâ€“Guatemalan territorial dispute since 1999 Guatemala has claimed Belizean territory south of the Sibun River.
